description: Required quantity is to acquire PN 7638-44 LEAD ACID BATTERY, PN 7638-53 LEAD ACID BATTERY
duration_in_months: Hold for a approximate period of ",
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Solicitation Reference:** T8493-24-0005

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA) T8493-140035 Series

**Expected Contract Start Date:** 07 June 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** 28 June 2024

**Notice Description**

Transport Canada's (TC) Air Services Directorate (ASD) invites qualified Supply Arrangement Holders to submit a proposal for the acquisition of Lead Acid Batteries (PN 7638-44 and PN 7638-53) under the T8493-140035 Series.

**Bidder Eligibility**

Only qualified Supply Arrangement Holders are eligible to submit a proposal. The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

- Bell Textron Canada
- Aero Supplies
- Execiare
- BSFInternational
- Alpine Aeotech
- Helitrades

**Proposal Documents**

The RFP documents were e-mailed directly to the invited Supply Arrangement Holders. Bidders are advised that Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents.

**Inquiries and Opportunity for Qualification**

Inquiries regarding the RFP requirement should be submitted to:

- Yula Zourdos, Contracting Authority
- Aircraft Services Directorate
- Transport Canada
- Building T-58, 200 Comet Private, Ottawa, Ontario K1V 7B2
- Phone: (343) 552-8343
- Email: [yula.zourdos@tc.gc.ca](mailto:yula.zourdos@tc.gc.ca)

A Notice will be posted at least once a year on GETS to allow more Suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series.

**Supply Arrangement Authority Contact Information**

For further information on the Supply Arrangement qualification process, please contact:

- Rick Long, Public Services Procurement Canada
- Email: [rick.long@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rick.long@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Trade Agreements and Regions**

This opportunity is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The successful bidder will be required to provide goods and services to the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Closing and Evaluation**

The tender closing date is 30 May 2024 at 11:00 AM. The proposal evaluation criteria are not specified, and the evaluation process will
